def_cn: (放置病弱婴儿,氧气浓度与温度可以控制的)恒温箱
def_en: An incubator is a piece of hospital equipment which helps weak or small babies to survive. It consists of a transparent container in which the oxygen and temperature levels can be controlled.
An incubator is a piece of equipment used to keep eggs or bacteria at the correct temperature for them to develop.
